item.title: Automate Your Curtains with a Tuya Stepper Motor and Home Assistant
item.description: Automate Your Curtains with a Tuya Stepper Motor and Home Assistant I’ve always been a fan of waking up to natural light, but dragging myself out of bed to open the curtains felt like a cruel joke. Enter: smart curtains. After some trial and error (and a few hilarious mishaps with overly eager motors), I landed on a reliable setup using a Tuya stepper motor and Home Assistant. Here’s how you can do it too.
